Pre-Game Insights: The Boston Red Sox will look to Tyler O’Neill for continued offensive production when they take on Juan Soto and the New York Yankees on Saturday, in the third game of a four-game series at Yankee Stadium.
The pitching staff for the Yankees has a collective nine K/9, the fifth-best in MLB.
The Red Sox’s 185 home runs rank eighth in Major League Baseball.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be broadcast on NESN.
The game can also be streamed live on Fubo.
Others: Odds for the game favor the Yankees as the favorite (-187) while the Red Sox are the underdog (+156).
The over/under for the game is set at 8.5 runs.
